sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Col, Container, Form, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import Layout from "../../../common/Layout"; import SEO from "../../../common/SEO"; import axios from "../../../axios"; import Separator from "../../../components/separator/Separator"; import SectionTitle from "../../../components/sectionTitle/SectionTitle"; const AddMagazine = (props) => { const [contact, setContact] = useState({ name: "", photo: "", content: "", title1: "", title2: "", title3: "", title4: "", datetime: "", serial: "", bigContent: "", sponser: "", sponser1: "", sponser2: "", aguulgaPhoto: "", aguulgaTitle1: "", aguulgaTitle2: "", aguulgaText1: "", aguulgaHuman: "", aguulgaPhoto1: "", aguulgaTitle3: "", aguulgaTitle4: "", aguulgaText2: "", aguulgaPhoto2: "", aguulgaTitle5: "", aguulgaTitle6: "", aguulgaText3: "", aguulgaHuman1: "", aguulgaPhoto3: "", aguulgaTitle7: "", aguulgaTitle8: "", aguulgaText4: "", aguulgaHuman2: "", aguulgaPhoto4: "", aguulgaTitle9: "", aguulgaTitle10: "", aguulgaText5: "", aguulgaHuman3: "", }); const [file, setFile] = useState(); const handleAddFormChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (event.target.type === "file") { setFile(event.target.files[0]); setContact({ ...contact, photo: event.target.files[0].name }); } else { const fieldName = event.target.getAttribute("name"); const fieldValue = event.target.value; setContact({ ...contact, [fieldName]: fieldValue }); } }; const handleAddFormSumbit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); const headers = { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }; axios .post("/books", contact, { headers }) .then((result) => { const newBook = result.data.data; const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); const data = new FormData(); data.append("file", file); xhr.open( "PUT", `http://209.97.169.212/api/v1/books/${newBook._id}/upload-photo`, { headers } ); xhr.send(data); console.log(data); console.log(result); props.history.push("/adminMagazines"); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (
{" "} <>
{/* Start Service Area */}
{/* End Service Area */}
Magazine Нэр Сэтгүүлийн нүүрний зураг Content Title1 Title2 Title3 Title4 DateTime Сэриал BigContent {/* Page2 */} aguulgaPhoto зураг aguulgaTitle1 aguulgaTitle2 aguulgaText1 aguulgaHuman aguulgaTitle1 {/* 22 */} aguulgaPhoto1 зураг aguulgaTitle3 aguulgaTitle4 aguulgaText2 aguulgaPhoto2 зураг aguulgaTitle5 aguulgaTitle6 aguulgaText3 aguulgaHuman1 aguulgaPhoto3 зураг aguulgaTitle7 aguulgaTitle8 aguulgaText4 aguulgaHuman2 aguulgaPhoto4 зураг aguulgaTitle9 aguulgaTitle10 aguulgaText5 aguulgaHuman3
); }; export default AddMagazine;
